author: kfogel
msg: Add some new test data for cvs2svn:

author: cmpilato
msg: (svn_swig_py_make_file): Fix some scoping Greg Stein noticed could
have been done a little more tightly.

author: gstein
msg: Adjust some of the includes in our headers files. There were some
unused includes, some stylistic ordering of includes, some <> instead
of "", and an improper location of one include.
This may address issue 1274 and issue 1308. (haven't tested that)
* include/svn_pools.h: moved include of apr_want.h outside of the C++
namespace block. We don't want to impose C on foreign headers.
* svnlook/main.c: insert a blank line between classes of includes
* libsvn_subr/path.c: add svn_io.h since it was removed from some
header, yet is needed in this file.
* libsvn_subr/config_auth.c: add svn_io.h. reorder blocks of includes.
reorder some blocks, fix some delimiters, add whitespace, etc.

author: cmpilato
msg: Lots of the same client code fixes, all centered around
interruptibility and memory usage.  Ensure that every client operation
that loops over targets a) uses subpools, and b) call the cancellation
(svn_cl__print_commit_info): Just moving this prototype down a bit.
In each of the follow locations, call the cancellation function after
In each of the follow locations, call the cancellation function after
each target is processed, and also introduce these suckers to the use

author: kfogel
msg: Set up a log parsing system, so it's easy to conduct spot checks of
repository history (especially useful for testing branch and tag
conversion, since we don't want to be forced to check out a working
copy for every inspection).  Use the new system to finish a test.
(ensure_conversion): Use the new repos_to_url helper function.
Return parsed logs along with repos and wc; all callers changed.
